person.persName: Henry Stanhope Bussey (Louisa, Kentucky, hotel keeper)

body.p: Louisa, Kentucky, postmaster and hotel keeper. Virginia native. Married to Christina Regania Miller Bussey in 1838. Father of Fremont Randall Bussey. Postmaster of Louisa from 1849 to 1853. Hotel keeper in Louisa in 1860.
